snippet: Courts have long grappled with the question of canine weaponization, and over the years judges have mostly arrived at the same conclusion: if you use Fido as a weapon, he becomes one.
abstract: Courts around country have long grappled with question of canine weaponization; over the years judges have mostly arrived at same conclusion that if you use dogs as weapons, they become weapons in the eyes of the law.
lead_paragraph: Courts have long grappled with the question of canine weaponization, and over the years judges have mostly arrived at the same conclusion: if you use Fido as a weapon, he becomes one.

headline.main: Instruments of Danger in Weapons Case Were Dogs, Authorities Say
headline.print_headline: Instruments of Danger in Weapons Case Were Dogs, Authorities Say
